Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing wild-type and mutant TPK1 proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The TPK1 protein expression was significantly reduced for the variant NM_003587.4:c.162A>G (p.Q54E) compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for both wild-type and mutant samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TPK1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was mentioned in the literature, but an empty vector or absence of any exogenous cDNA could be used for comparison.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: TPK1 protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: TPK1 protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type.
